desc.en: Sensei and the task force manage to rescue Serika from the Helmet Gang. Ayane finds signs of contraband among the tank's wreckage. Meanwhile, the Kaiser PMC that controlled the Helmet Gang decides to enlist the help of Problem Solver 68.
desc.jp: Sensei and the task force manage to rescue Serika from the Helmet Gang. Ayane finds signs of contraband among the tank's wreckage. Meanwhile, the Kaiser PMC that controlled the Helmet Gang decides to enlist the help of Problem Solver 68.
desc.thai: Sensei and the task force manage to rescue Serika from the Helmet Gang. Ayane finds signs of contraband among the tank's wreckage. Meanwhile, the Kaiser PMC that controlled the Helmet Gang decides to enlist the help of Problem Solver 68.
desc.ko: Sensei and the task force manage to rescue Serika from the Helmet Gang. Ayane finds signs of contraband among the tank's wreckage. Meanwhile, the Kaiser PMC that controlled the Helmet Gang decides to enlist the help of Problem Solver 68.
desc.zh_tw: 順利從頭盔團手中救出茜香的老師和對策委員會學生們。戰鬥後，綾音從頭盔團所使用的戰車殘骸中，發現奇普托斯外部勢力的痕跡。另一方面，在背後控制頭盔團的凱薩PMC的理事，由於對於接二連三的失敗大失所望，於是便雇用新的便利屋職員來取代頭盔團。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 顺利从头盔团手中救出芹香的老师和对策委员会学生们。战斗后，绫音从头盔团所使用的战车残骸中，发现奇普托斯外部势力的痕迹。另一方面，在背后控制头盔团的凯萨PMC的理事，由于对于接二连三的失败大失所望，于是便雇用新的便利屋职员来取代头盔团。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 顺利从头盔团手中救出茜香的老师和对策委员会学生们。战斗后，绫音从头盔团所使用的战车残骸中，发现奇普托斯外部势力的痕迹。另一方面，在背后控制头盔团的凯萨PMC的理事，由于对于接二连三的失败大失所望，于是便雇用新的便利屋职员来取代头盔团。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 顺利从头盔团手中救出茜香的老师和对策委员会学生们。战斗后，绫音从头盔团所使用的战车残骸中，发现奇普托斯外部势力的痕迹。另一方面，在背后控制头盔团的凯萨PMC的理事，由于对于接二连三的失败大失所望，于是便雇用新的便利屋职员来取代头盔团。

desc.en: Though successfully rescued Serika, she still fell apart after getting a shot of the anti-air missile. Ayane found the Helmet Gang seemed to be using illegal weapons in Kivotos, suggesting that there might be a bigger hand in the dark.
desc.jp: Though successfully rescued Serika, she still fell apart after getting a shot of the anti-air missile. Ayane found the Helmet Gang seemed to be using illegal weapons in Kivotos, suggesting that there might be a bigger hand in the dark.
desc.thai: Though successfully rescued Serika, she still fell apart after getting a shot of the anti-air missile. Ayane found the Helmet Gang seemed to be using illegal weapons in Kivotos, suggesting that there might be a bigger hand in the dark.
desc.ko: Though successfully rescued Serika, she still fell apart after getting a shot of the anti-air missile. Ayane found the Helmet Gang seemed to be using illegal weapons in Kivotos, suggesting that there might be a bigger hand in the dark.
desc.zh_tw: 雖然救出了芹香，但吃了一發防空導彈的芹香還是支稜不住。凌音發現頭盔團似乎使用了基沃託斯境內違法使用的武器，認為其背後有更大的幕後黑手。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 虽然救出了芹香，但吃了一发防空导弹的芹香还是支棱不住。凌音发现头盔团似乎使用了基沃托斯境内违法使用的武器，认为其背后有更大的幕后黑手。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 虽然救出了芹香，但吃了一发防空导弹的芹香还是支棱不住。凌音发现头盔团似乎使用了基沃托斯境内违法使用的武器，认为其背后有更大的幕后黑手。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 虽然救出了芹香，但吃了一发防空导弹的芹香还是支棱不住。凌音发现头盔团似乎使用了基沃托斯境内违法使用的武器，认为其背后有更大的幕后黑手。

desc.zh_tw: 因為頭盔團不力，PMC決定聘請“專家”便利屋68完成任務。便利屋68把阿拜多斯周圍的頭盔團成員給掃除了一部分，建立勢力範圍。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.

desc.en: Hifumi agrees to guide The Foreclosure Task Force around the market in return for helping her earlier. Meanwhile, the boss of Problem Solver 68, Aru, struggles to get a loan so she can pay off her earlier mistake.
desc.jp: Hifumi agrees to guide The Foreclosure Task Force around the market in return for helping her earlier. Meanwhile, the boss of Problem Solver 68, Aru, struggles to get a loan so she can pay off her earlier mistake.

desc.ko: Hifumi agrees to guide The Foreclosure Task Force around the market in return for helping her earlier. Meanwhile, the boss of Problem Solver 68, Aru, struggles to get a loan so she can pay off her earlier mistake.
desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會一行人要求日步美介紹黑市，以作為讓她從小流氓手中脫險的代價。因此一行人便與步美同行一段時間。另一方面，便利屋68的社長亞瑠，為了挽回之前的敗仗而尋找借用資金的方法。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对策委员会一行人要求日富美介绍黑市，以作为让她从小流氓手中脱险的代价。因此一行人便与步美同行一段时间。另一方面，便利屋68的社长阿露，为了挽回之前的败仗而寻找借用资金的方法。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 对策委员会一行人要求日步美介绍黑市，以作为让她从小流氓手中脱险的代价。因此一行人便与步美同行一段时间。另一方面，便利屋68的社长亚瑠，为了挽回之前的败仗而寻找借用资金的方法。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 对策委员会一行人要求日步美介绍黑市，以作为让她从小流氓手中脱险的代价。因此一行人便与步美同行一段时间。另一方面，便利屋68的社长亚瑠，为了挽回之前的败仗而寻找借用资金的方法。

desc.ko: The failure mission carried out by Problem Solver 68 shocked the PMC, who insisted that the data must be wrong. Yet Black Suit thought the data was nothing wrong and decided to investigate the reasons.
desc.zh_tw: 便利屋68任務失敗，讓PMC方面大為震驚，認為絕對是資料出了問題。黑服認為資料絕對無誤，決定去調查具體原因。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 便利屋68任务失败，让PMC方面大为震惊，认为绝对是数据出了问题。黑服认为数据绝对无误，决定去调查具体原因。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 便利屋68任务失败，让PMC方面大为震惊，认为绝对是数据出了问题。黑服认为数据绝对无误，决定去调查具体原因。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.

desc.zh_tw: 是PMC公司及其各個子公司的CEO，蔚藍檔案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇與最終章中均有出現，主要目標是將基沃託斯納入自己的手下統治；曾與黑色西服人合作過。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.en: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.jp: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.thai: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.ko: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.zh_tw: 巡視黑市的對策委員會一行人看到，自己所償還的債款流入暗黑銀行。當學生們得知自己努力還的錢被用來做違法勾當，便在一怒之下決定搶銀行。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 巡视黑市的对策委员会一行人看到，自己所偿还的债款流入暗黑银行。当学生们得知自己努力还的钱被用来做违法勾当，便在一怒之下决定抢银行。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 巡视黑市的对策委员会一行人看到，自己所偿还的债款流入暗黑银行。当学生们得知自己努力还的钱被用来做违法勾当，便在一怒之下决定抢银行。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 巡视黑市的对策委员会一行人看到，自己所偿还的债款流入暗黑银行。当学生们得知自己努力还的钱被用来做违法勾当，便在一怒之下决定抢银行。

desc.en: Walking for hours long, the Foreclosure Task Force and Hifumi were all exhausted. Wanting to eat some Taiyaki, Nonomi offered everyone some snacks.
desc.jp: Walking for hours long, the Foreclosure Task Force and Hifumi were all exhausted. Wanting to eat some Taiyaki, Nonomi offered everyone some snacks.

desc.zh_tw: 走了幾小時的對策委員會與日步美筋疲力盡，野乃美因為想吃鯛魚燒，於是順帶請了所有人一份。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 走了几小时的对策委员会与日富美筋疲力尽，野宫因为想吃鲷鱼烧，于是顺带请了所有人一份。

desc.en: Everyone discovered that their debt payment seemed to be flowing directly into the bank. And in order to prove this, Shiroko brought up her plan of robbing a bank again, hoping to find the documents in the process. Hifumi was then "willingly" to be involved in this.

desc.en: The documents reveal the true mastermind: a mega-syndicate known as the Kaiser Corporation. Confronted with such a seemingly insurmountable societal evil, the dejected students of the Foreclosure Task Force call it a day.
desc.jp: The documents reveal the true mastermind: a mega-syndicate known as the Kaiser Corporation. Confronted with such a seemingly insurmountable societal evil, the dejected students of the Foreclosure Task Force call it a day.
desc.thai: The documents reveal the true mastermind: a mega-syndicate known as the Kaiser Corporation. Confronted with such a seemingly insurmountable societal evil, the dejected students of the Foreclosure Task Force call it a day.
desc.ko: The documents reveal the true mastermind: a mega-syndicate known as the Kaiser Corporation. Confronted with such a seemingly insurmountable societal evil, the dejected students of the Foreclosure Task Force call it a day.
desc.zh_tw: 透過從暗黑銀行帶來的文件，對策委員會一行人得知所有事件的黑幕，就是大型企業<凱薩公司>。在包圍學校的社會巨惡面前，學生們失去鬥志後決定暫時解散。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 通过从暗黑银行带来的文档，对策委员会一行人得知所有事件的黑幕，就是大型企业<凯萨公司>。在包围学校的社会巨恶面前，学生们失去斗志后决定暂时解散。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 通过从暗黑银行带来的文档，对策委员会一行人得知所有事件的黑幕，就是大型企业<凯萨公司>。在包围学校的社会巨恶面前，学生们失去斗志后决定暂时解散。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 通过从暗黑银行带来的文档，对策委员会一行人得知所有事件的黑幕，就是大型企业<凯萨公司>。在包围学校的社会巨恶面前，学生们失去斗志后决定暂时解散。

desc.en: After a careful inspection on the records, they did find out the money was flowing into the bank, and was directly used to support the Helmet Gang. Everything showed that Kaiser Corporation seemed to be plotting against Abydos.
desc.jp: After a careful inspection on the records, they did find out the money was flowing into the bank, and was directly used to support the Helmet Gang. Everything showed that Kaiser Corporation seemed to be plotting against Abydos.
desc.thai: After a careful inspection on the records, they did find out the money was flowing into the bank, and was directly used to support the Helmet Gang. Everything showed that Kaiser Corporation seemed to be plotting against Abydos.
desc.ko: After a careful inspection on the records, they did find out the money was flowing into the bank, and was directly used to support the Helmet Gang. Everything showed that Kaiser Corporation seemed to be plotting against Abydos.
desc.zh_tw: 眾人經過對記錄的詳細檢查，發現記錄的確流向了黑市銀行，並發現自己的款項被直接用於頭盔團的支援工作。一切表明凱撒公司似乎對阿拜多斯圖謀不軌。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人经过对记录的详细检查，发现记录的确流向了黑市银行，并发现自己的款项被直接用于头盔团的支持工作。一切表明凯撒公司似乎对阿拜多斯图谋不轨。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人经过对记录的详细检查，发现记录的确流向了黑市银行，并发现自己的款项被直接用于头盔团的支持工作。一切表明凯撒公司似乎对阿拜多斯图谋不轨。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 众人经过对记录的详细检查，发现记录的确流向了黑市银行，并发现自己的款项被直接用于头盔团的支持工作。一切表明凯撒公司似乎对阿拜多斯图谋不轨。

desc.en: Someone purposed to get back to Gehenna, yet by Kayoko's careful analysis, the existence of the Prefect Team, especially Hina, would make them impossible to win and therefore impractical to go back.
desc.jp: Someone purposed to get back to Gehenna, yet by Kayoko's careful analysis, the existence of the Prefect Team, especially Hina, would make them impossible to win and therefore impractical to go back.
desc.thai: Someone purposed to get back to Gehenna, yet by Kayoko's careful analysis, the existence of the Prefect Team, especially Hina, would make them impossible to win and therefore impractical to go back.
desc.ko: Someone purposed to get back to Gehenna, yet by Kayoko's careful analysis, the existence of the Prefect Team, especially Hina, would make them impossible to win and therefore impractical to go back.
desc.zh_tw: 中間有人提出了回到格黑娜的選項，但佳代子謹慎分析了形勢，認為由於有風紀委員會，尤其是陽奈的存在，他們幾乎沒有勝算，回去其實挺不實際的。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 中间有人提出了回到格黑娜的选项，但佳代子谨慎分析了形势，认为由于有风纪委员会，尤其是日奈的存在，他们几乎没有胜算，回去其实挺不实际的。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 中间有人提出了回到格黑娜的选项，但佳代子谨慎分析了形势，认为由于有风纪委员会，尤其是阳奈的存在，他们几乎没有胜算，回去其实挺不实际的。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 中间有人提出了回到格黑娜的选项，但佳代子谨慎分析了形势，认为由于有风纪委员会，尤其是阳奈的存在，他们几乎没有胜算，回去其实挺不实际的。

desc.en: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.jp: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.thai: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.ko: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠用向對策委員會成員取得的錢攻擊阿拜多斯高中。對此，亞瑠感到良心的譴責而苦惱不斷。為了鼓勵無精打采的亞瑠，便利屋職員們一同前往柴關拉麵店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出現在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露用向对策委员会成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，阿露感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的阿露，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠用向对策委员会成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，亚瑠感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的亚瑠，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚瑠用向对策委员会成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，亚瑠感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的亚瑠，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。

desc.en: Aru was worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki didn't understand why Aru didn't take the money first, and Aru expressed her concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.jp: Aru was worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki didn't understand why Aru didn't take the money first, and Aru expressed her concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.thai: Aru was worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki didn't understand why Aru didn't take the money first, and Aru expressed her concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.ko: Aru was worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki didn't understand why Aru didn't take the money first, and Aru expressed her concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠一整晚對再戰阿拜多斯一行人而擔憂，遙香則佈置好了炸彈。無月不解為什麼亞瑠不先收錢辦事，亞瑠則說是怕被顧客干涉太多。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露一整晚对再战阿拜多斯一行人而担忧，遥香则布置好了炸弹。睦月不解为什么阿露不先收钱办事，阿露则说是怕被顾客干涉太多。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠一整晚对再战阿拜多斯一行人而担忧，遥香则布置好了炸弹。无月不解为什么亚瑠不先收钱办事，亚瑠则说是怕被顾客干涉太多。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚瑠一整晚对再战阿拜多斯一行人而担忧，遥香则布置好了炸弹。无月不解为什么亚瑠不先收钱办事，亚瑠则说是怕被顾客干涉太多。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.zh_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚藍檔案中的反派角色，隸屬於組織“數祕會”。其主要目標是研究基沃託斯中的神祕，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多個故事中均有出現。

desc.en: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.jp: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.thai: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.ko: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.zh_tw: 由於和風紀委員會的亞子交涉不順利，以至於最後充滿敵對氣息。對策委員會決定與便利屋一行人合作，對抗具有壓倒性戰力的風紀委員會。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 由于和风纪委员会的亚子交涉不顺利，以至于最后充满敌对气息。对策委员会决定与便利屋一行人合作，对抗具有压倒性战力的风纪委员会。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 由于和风纪委员会的亚子交涉不顺利，以至于最后充满敌对气息。对策委员会决定与便利屋一行人合作，对抗具有压倒性战力的风纪委员会。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 由于和风纪委员会的亚子交涉不顺利，以至于最后充满敌对气息。对策委员会决定与便利屋一行人合作，对抗具有压倒性战力的风纪委员会。

desc.en: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.jp: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.thai: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.ko: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.zh_tw: 好不容易結束了艱苦的戰鬥，但是風紀委員的數量又大為增加。那時，風紀委員長陽奈現身，針對此狀況責問亞子。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 好不容易结束了艰苦的战斗，但是风纪委员的数量又大为增加。那时，风纪委员长日奈现身，针对此状况责问亚子。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 好不容易结束了艰苦的战斗，但是风纪委员的数量又大为增加。那时，风纪委员长阳奈现身，针对此状况责问亚子。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 好不容易结束了艰苦的战斗，但是风纪委员的数量又大为增加。那时，风纪委员长阳奈现身，针对此状况责问亚子。

desc.en: Sensei suddenly made an eye contact with Haruka. Haruka squeezed a smile and then left in a hurry. Sensei also pretended not paying any attention.
desc.jp: Sensei suddenly made an eye contact with Haruka. Haruka squeezed a smile and then left in a hurry. Sensei also pretended not paying any attention.

desc.ko: Sensei suddenly made an eye contact with Haruka. Haruka squeezed a smile and then left in a hurry. Sensei also pretended not paying any attention.
desc.zh_tw: 老師突然將視線與遙香的對上了。遙香對老師笑了一下，然後匆匆離開。老師也假裝並無在意。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师突然将视线与遥香的对上了。遥香对老师笑了一下，然后匆匆离开。老师也假装并无在意。

desc.en: Ako first apologized for the attack launched by Prefect Team and hoped to transfer the Problem Solver 68 to them for further investigation, which was naturally rejected. Ayane argued with factual facts, yet Ako refused to take a step back. She said "It's probably because you have Schale's Sensei at your side."
desc.jp: Ako first apologized for the attack launched by Prefect Team and hoped to transfer the Problem Solver 68 to them for further investigation, which was naturally rejected. Ayane argued with factual facts, yet Ako refused to take a step back. She said "It's probably because you have Schale's Sensei at your side."

desc.zh_tw: 亞子首先為風紀委員會發起的攻擊道歉，隨後表示希望對策委員會將便利屋68的處置交由他們進行，結果自然受到了拒絕。綾音據理力爭，而亞子則並不讓步，並表示“這大概是因為有夏萊的老師站在你們這邊吧”。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚子首先为风纪委员会发起的攻击道歉，随后表示希望对策委员会将便利屋68的处置交由他们进行，结果自然受到了拒绝。绫音据理力争，而亚子则并不让步，并表示“这大概是因为有夏莱的老师站在你们这边吧”。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚子首先为风纪委员会发起的攻击道歉，随后表示希望对策委员会将便利屋68的处置交由他们进行，结果自然受到了拒绝。绫音据理力争，而亚子则并不让步，并表示“这大概是因为有夏莱的老师站在你们这边吧”。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚子首先为风纪委员会发起的攻击道歉，随后表示希望对策委员会将便利屋68的处置交由他们进行，结果自然受到了拒绝。绫音据理力争，而亚子则并不让步，并表示“这大概是因为有夏莱的老师站在你们这边吧”。

desc.en: The negotiations ended badly and Ako decided to attack again. Yet the Prefect Team was suddenly assaulted by Haruka. Meanwhile, Kayoko began to gradually expose Ako's deception: the way that leading much troops to trouble in another district was definitely not Hina's doings, but in fact Ako's; the target was actually Schale, and it would make sense to lead extra troops.

Meanwhile, Kayoko began to gradually expose Ako's deception: the way that leading much troops to trouble in another district was definitely not Hina's doings, but in fact Ako's; the target was actually Schale, and it would make sense to lead extra troops.

desc.zh_tw: 談判破裂，亞子打算繼續攻擊。然而風紀委員會突然受到遙香的攻擊，同時佳代子也開始逐步拆穿亞子的騙局：帶大量兵力來其他自治區鬧事絕非陽奈所為，實際上是亞子自己出兵；目標實際上是夏萊，所以帶了額外兵力就在情理之中。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 谈判破裂，亚子打算继续攻击。然而风纪委员会突然受到遥香的攻击，同时佳代子也开始逐步拆穿亚子的骗局：带大量兵力来其他自治区闹事绝非日奈所为，实际上是亚子自己出兵；目标实际上是夏莱，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 谈判破裂，亚子打算继续攻击。然而对策委员会突然受到遥香的攻击，同时佳代子也开始逐步拆穿亚子的骗局：带大量兵力来其他自治区闹事绝非阳奈所为，实际上是亚子自己出兵；目标实际上是夏莱，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 谈判破裂，亚子打算继续攻击。然而对策委员会突然受到遥香的攻击，同时佳代子也开始逐步拆穿亚子的骗局：带大量兵力来其他自治区闹事绝非阳奈所为，实际上是亚子自己出兵；目标实际上是夏莱，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。

desc.en: Being exposed, Ako launched another attack without further ado, and declared everyone her own plan: as the Eden Treaty going to be signed, the Prefect Team worried that such organization would interfere the signing (the intel itself came from Trinity's Hifumi telling it to the Tea Party, which then was gotten on hand by Gehenna). As planned, they would first put Sensei under house arrest and then deal with Problem Solver 68.

As planned, they would first put Sensei under house arrest and then deal with Problem Solver 68.
desc.zh_tw: 亞子被拆穿後立刻發起了攻擊，並向所有人直接宣告了自己的計劃：由於伊甸條約簽署在即，風紀委員會擔心夏萊這樣的組織會干涉條約簽署（這一情報來源於三一的日步美將內容給了茶會，而茶會的情報又被格黑娜拿到手了），於是便打算先將老師軟禁在格黑娜，順帶處理便利屋68。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚子被拆穿后立刻发起了攻击，并向所有人直接宣告了自己的计划：由于伊甸条约签署在即，风机委员会担心夏莱这样的组织会干涉条约签署（这一情报来源于三一的日富美将内容给了茶会，而茶会的情报又被格黑娜拿到手了），于是便打算先将老师软禁在格黑娜，顺带处理便利屋68。

desc.zh_tw: 儘管戰敗且自家隊伍連連撤退，但亞子仍然沒有放棄，繼續向眾人發起攻擊。佳代子敏銳感覺到這並非亞子所擁有的調兵許可權，其中必有貓膩。

desc.en: Ako was well aware of the risks but decided to proceed anyways. At this moment Hina connected onto the comm. Ako originally wanted to take "on patrol" as an excuse, but Hina had already understood most of it and came out in person.
desc.jp: Ako was well aware of the risks but decided to proceed anyways. At this moment Hina connected onto the comm. Ako originally wanted to take "on patrol" as an excuse, but Hina had already understood most of it and came out in person.

desc.zh_tw: 亞子自己也知道其中的風險，但還是決定一意孤行。就在這時陽奈接入通訊，亞子本想以“巡邏”等藉口搪塞過去，但陽奈已經清楚了大部分事宜，並親自來到了現場。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚子自己也知道其中的风险，但还是决定一意孤行。就在这时日奈接入通讯，亚子本想以“巡逻”等借口搪塞过去，但日奈已经清楚了大部分事宜，并亲自来到了现场。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚子自己也知道其中的风险，但还是决定一意孤行。就在这时阳奈接入通讯，亚子本想以“巡逻”等借口搪塞过去，但阳奈已经清楚了大部分事宜，并亲自来到了现场。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚子自己也知道其中的风险，但还是决定一意孤行。就在这时阳奈接入通讯，亚子本想以“巡逻”等借口搪塞过去，但阳奈已经清楚了大部分事宜，并亲自来到了现场。

desc.en: Having heard Ako's story, Hina promptly apologizes for the Prefect Team overstepping their bounds. While commanding her forces to pull out, Hina subtly informs Sensei that the Kaiser Corporation is up to something in the Abydos Desert.
desc.jp: Having heard Ako's story, Hina promptly apologizes for the Prefect Team overstepping their bounds. While commanding her forces to pull out, Hina subtly informs Sensei that the Kaiser Corporation is up to something in the Abydos Desert.

desc.zh_tw: 陽奈聽聞來龍去脈後，對於亞子擅自動用風紀委員會一事，老實地向對策委員會道歉。另外在撤兵的同時，陽奈悄悄地給老師情報，告訴老師凱薩在阿拜多斯沙漠做些什麼事。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日奈听闻来龙去脉后，对于亚子擅自动用风纪委员会一事，老实地向对策委员会道歉。另外在撤兵的同时，日奈悄悄地给老师情报，告诉老师凯萨在阿拜多斯沙漠做些什么事。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳奈听闻来龙去脉后，对于亚子擅自动用风纪委员会一事，老实地向对策委员会道歉。另外在撤兵的同时，阳奈悄悄地给老师情报，告诉老师凯萨在阿拜多斯沙漠做些什么事。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 阳奈听闻来龙去脉后，对于亚子擅自动用风纪委员会一事，老实地向对策委员会道歉。另外在撤兵的同时，阳奈悄悄地给老师情报，告诉老师凯萨在阿拜多斯沙漠做些什么事。

desc.en: Ako tried to explain that she was fighting against Problem Solver 68, but the latter had been long gone. Hina got even angrier but then expressed her understanding, yet she still pointed out that such political issues should be left to the Pandemonium Society. Hina said Ako would be punished with confinement.
desc.jp: Ako tried to explain that she was fighting against Problem Solver 68, but the latter had been long gone. Hina got even angrier but then expressed her understanding, yet she still pointed out that such political issues should be left to the Pandemonium Society. Hina said Ako would be punished with confinement.

Hina got even angrier but then expressed her understanding, yet she still pointed out that such political issues should be left to the Pandemonium Society. Hina said Ako would be punished with confinement.
desc.zh_tw: 亞子試圖解釋自己是在和便利屋68作戰，但轉眼間後者便消失不見。陽奈的臉越來越黑，不過隨後表示理解，但仍然指出此類政治問題應交由萬魔殿進行處理。陽奈表示將處以亞子禁閉處分。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚子试图解释自己是在和便利屋68作战，但转眼间后者便消失不见。日奈的脸越来越黑，不过随后表示理解，但仍然指出此类政治问题应交由万魔殿进行处理。日奈表示将处以亚子禁闭处分。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚子试图解释自己是在和便利屋68作战，但转眼间后者便消失不见。阳奈的脸越来越黑，不过随后表示理解，但仍然指出此类政治问题应交由万魔殿进行处理。阳奈表示将处以亚子紧闭处分。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚子试图解释自己是在和便利屋68作战，但转眼间后者便消失不见。阳奈的脸越来越黑，不过随后表示理解，但仍然指出此类政治问题应交由万魔殿进行处理。阳奈表示将处以亚子紧闭处分。

desc.en: Hina said the conflict was indeed their wrong doings, but it was also true that they had interfered with Gehenna's official duties. The Abydos remained hostile, though. At this moment Ayane mentioned Hoshino, and Hoshino appeared just on time. Hina exchanged a few words with Hoshino and expressed her surprise at Hoshino's dramatic character change. Hina mentioned "that incident" and suddenly realized something.

Hina mentioned "that incident" and suddenly realized something.
desc.zh_tw: 陽奈表示衝突確實是自己人不對，但干涉了格黑娜的公務卻也是事實。眾人表示不會輕易放過。就在這時綾音提起了星野，而星野也隨叫隨到。陽奈與星野寒暄了幾句，對星野性格變化之大表示驚訝。陽奈提到了“那次事件”，隨後突然意識到了什麼。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日奈表示冲突确实是自己人不对，但干涉了格黑娜的公务却也是事实。众人表示不会轻易放过。就在这时绫音提起了星野，而星野也随叫随到。日奈与星野寒暄了几句，对星野性格变化之大表示惊讶。日奈提到了“那次事件”，随后突然意识到了什么。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳奈表示冲突确实是自己人不对，但干涉了格黑娜的公务却也是事实。众人表示不会轻易放过。就在这时绫音提起了星野，而星野也随叫随到。阳奈与星野寒暄了几句，对星野性格变化之大表示惊讶。阳奈提到了“那次事件”，随后突然意识到了什么。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 阳奈表示冲突确实是自己人不对，但干涉了格黑娜的公务却也是事实。众人表示不会轻易放过。就在这时绫音提起了星野，而星野也随叫随到。阳奈与星野寒暄了几句，对星野性格变化之大表示惊讶。阳奈提到了“那次事件”，随后突然意识到了什么。

desc.zh_tw: 老師為前往阿拜多斯的便利屋送行。另一方面，綾音和茜香一同去找住院的柴關老闆，從老闆口中得知拉麵店的大樓已落入凱薩手中的事。

desc.en: Due to the inability to pay rent, as well as exposing their location during the fight with the Prefect Team, the Problem Solver had to move their office out of the place. Though saying "Because this is how a badass should be...", Aru was interrupted and was commented with "really worries others".

desc.zh_tw: 老師遇到了搬家的便利屋全體成員們，祝他們一路順風。亞瑠表示與老師成為合作伙伴很高興，且今後一定也會回阿拜多斯看看，尤其是會回來吃美味的拉麵。裝著便利屋68東西的卡車隨後消失在路口。

desc.en: Ayane and Serika visited Master Shiba and expressed their pity on the destruction of the ramen shop. But unexpectedly, Master Shiba said that he had already received a notice to close down the store, which made the two very surprised. Master Shiba explained that due to the inability to pay the debts, the lands of Abydos were not belong to the school and was bought by Kaiser. Master Shiba also mentioned that there was a big bag of money in front of the store, and Sensei suggested that they might be used as a reconstruction fund.

desc.zh_tw: 綾音和茜香前來看望柴大將，表示拉麵店被毀掉了實屬可惜。但意外的是，柴大將表示本來就收到了關店通知，這讓兩人感到非常詫異。大將表示，前些年由於債款無法還上，阿拜多斯土地所有權實際已經不屬於學校，貸款給了凱撒公司。大將還提到了店門口有一個大袋子裝著錢，老師則提議不妨將它們作為重建資金。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 绫音和芹香前来看望柴大将，表示拉面店被毁掉了实属可惜。但意外的是，柴大将表示本来就收到了关店通知，这让两人感到非常诧异。大将表示，前些年由于债款无法还上，阿拜多斯土地所有权实际已经不属于学校，贷款给了凯撒公司。大将还提到了店门口有一个大袋子装着钱，老师则提议不妨将它们作为重建资金。

desc.en: Hoshino recounts history to the Foreclosure Task Force. It's likely the now-defunct Abydos Student Council tried to repay its debts until the land was eventually repossessed by the Kaiser Corporation. Sensei suggests following Hina's hint and to go to the Abydos Desert.
desc.jp: Hoshino recounts history to the Foreclosure Task Force. It's likely the now-defunct Abydos Student Council tried to repay its debts until the land was eventually repossessed by the Kaiser Corporation. Sensei suggests following Hina's hint and to go to the Abydos Desert.

desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會從星野口中聽說昔日往事。現在推測，消失的阿拜多斯學生會為了償還債務，結果但卻連土地都被凱薩搶走了。老師依照從陽奈那裡聽說的，提議前往阿拜多斯沙漠。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对策委员会从星野口中听说昔日往事。现在推测，消失的阿拜多斯学生会为了偿还债务，结果但却连土地都被凯萨抢走了。老师依照从日奈那里听说的，提议前往阿拜多斯沙漠。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 对策委员会从星野口中听说昔日往事。现在推测，消失的阿拜多斯学生会为了偿还债务，结果但却连土地都被凯萨抢走了。老师依照从阳奈那里听说的，提议前往阿拜多斯沙漠。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 对策委员会从星野口中听说昔日往事。现在推测，消失的阿拜多斯学生会为了偿还债务，结果但却连土地都被凯萨抢走了。老师依照从阳奈那里听说的，提议前往阿拜多斯沙漠。

desc.en: The truth is, most of the land in Abydos had been owned by Kaiser Corporation (Kaiser Construction to be exact). Not only was everyone confused about the reason behind it, but also how it was done. Hoshino and Ayane said, these transactions should be made by the people from the former student union, as they have the highest authority.

Not only was everyone confused about the reason behind it, but also how it was done. Hoshino and Ayane said, these transactions should be made by the people from the former student union, as they have the highest authority.

Hoshino and Ayane said, these transactions should be made by the people from the former student union, as they have the highest authority.
desc.zh_tw: 事實是，阿拜多斯的大多數土地均已歸屬於凱撒集團（凱撒建設）。眾人不僅對為何要奪走這麼多土地表示疑問，也不解究竟是怎麼辦到的。星野和綾音表示，由於學生會有學校的最高許可權，因而這些交易應都是由前學生會的人所做。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 事实是，阿拜多斯的大多数土地均已归属于凯撒集团（凯撒建设）。众人不仅对为何要夺走这么多土地表示疑问，也不解究竟是怎么办到的。星野和绫音表示，由于学生会有学校的最高权限，因而这些交易应都是由前学生会的人所做。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 事实是，阿拜多斯的大多数土地均已归属于凯撒集团（凯撒建设）。众人不仅对为何要夺走这么多土地表示疑问，也不解究竟是怎么办到的。星野和绫音表示，由于学生会有学校的最高权限，因而这些交易应都是由前学生会的人所做。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 事实是，阿拜多斯的大多数土地均已归属于凯撒集团（凯撒建设）。众人不仅对为何要夺走这么多土地表示疑问，也不解究竟是怎么办到的。星野和绫音表示，由于学生会有学校的最高权限，因而这些交易应都是由前学生会的人所做。

desc.en: Hoshino describe the situation back then, and in a nutshell, it was in chaos. The desertification was extremely serious at then, and the school was forced to relocate for several times. Not only did the student number dropping fast, teachers nowhere to find, but also most of the student union had resigned. There was only one left, but that person was unreliable, just like Hoshino had a bad temper at then, according to Hoshino. Everyone was shocked by the fact. Shiroko said Hoshino had no need to belittle herself, saying that she was a responsible president.

desc.zh_tw: 星野闡述了當時情況，總結起來十分混亂。當時荒漠化已經非常嚴重，學校被迫搬遷數次。不僅學生只剩下兩位數、教職工基本不存在導致教學停止，學生會的人也大多已經辭職，只剩下另外一位前輩。但星野表示那位前輩也不靠譜，而她那時性格也並不怎樣。眾人對此表示驚異。白子表示星野沒有必要這麼貶低自己，表示她是個很有責任感的會長。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野阐述了当时情况，总结起来十分混乱。当时荒漠化已经非常严重，学校被迫搬迁数次。不仅学生只剩下两位数、教职工基本不存在导致教学停止，学生会的人也大多已经辞职，只剩下另外一位前辈。但星野表示那位前辈也不靠谱，而她那时性格也并不怎样。众人对此表示惊异。白子表示星野没有必要这么贬低自己，表示她是个很有责任感的会长。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 星野阐述了当时情况，总结起来十分混乱。当时荒漠化已经非常严重，学校被迫搬迁数次。不仅学生只剩下两位数、教职工基本不存在导致教学停止，学生会的人也大多已经辞职，只剩下另外一位前辈。但星野表示那位前辈也不靠谱，而她那时性格也并不怎样。众人对此表示惊异。白字表示星野没有必要这么贬低自己，表示她是个很有责任感的会长。

desc.en: Everyone started to discuss why the school would decide to sell the land to Kaiser. Everyone thought it was because of the debts. However, due to the low selling prices, it was no use after all. Sensei suddenly noticed that, both the lender and buyer were all Kaiser, and Abydos was in fact in a trap set by Kaiser, whose goal might actually be the land of Abydos. Serika could not understand why the student union would do such things, but Hoshino said that people would certainly do such if they were cornered.

desc.zh_tw: 大家開始討論學校究竟為什麼要把土地賣給凱撒集團。大家普遍認為是債款已經堆積過多導致，但由於出售價格過低，實際上也沒有什麼用。這時老師突然注意到，貸款方和購買方似乎都是凱撒集團，阿拜多斯實際上中了凱撒集團的圈套，後者目標很可能是阿拜多斯的土地。芹香無法理解學生會為什麼會做出這樣的決定，但星野則表示，走投無路的人們的確會做出這樣的事。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 大家开始讨论学校究竟为什么要把土地卖给凯撒集团。大家普遍认为是债款已经堆积过多导致，但由于出售价格过低，实际上也没有什么用。这时老师突然注意到，贷款方和购买方似乎都是凯撒集团，阿拜多斯实际上中了凯撒集团的圈套，后者目标很可能是阿拜多斯的土地。芹香无法理解学生会为什么会做出这样的决定，但星野则表示，走投无路的人们的确会做出这样的事。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 大家开始讨论学校究竟为什么要把土地卖给凯撒集团。大家普遍认为是债款已经堆积过多导致，但由于出售价格过低，实际上也没有什么用。这时老师突然注意到，贷款方和购买方似乎都是凯撒集团，阿拜多斯实际上中了凯撒集团的圈套，后者目标很可能是阿拜多斯的土地。芹香无法理解学生会为什么会做出这样的决定，但星野则表示，走投无路的人们的确会做出这样的事。

desc.en: With current clues on hand, Ayane finally confirmed that Kaiser's goal was exactly the land of Abydos. The exact reason remained unknown. Sensei told everyone the things he heard from Hina, and everyone decided to go to the desert immediately.

desc.zh_tw: 綾音透過已有的線索，最終認定凱撒集團盯上的正是阿拜多斯的土地，但對具體原因仍並不特別清楚。老師向各位講出了從陽奈那聽來的事情，眾人立刻決定前往沙漠。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 绫音通过已有的线索，最终认定凯撒集团盯上的正是阿拜多斯的土地，但对具体原因仍并不特别清楚。老师向各位讲出了从日奈那听来的事情，众人立刻决定前往沙漠。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 绫音通过已有的线索，最终认定凯撒集团盯上的正是阿拜多斯的土地，但对具体原因仍并不特别清楚。老师向各位讲出了从阳奈那听来的事情，众人立刻决定前往沙漠。

desc.en: Before leaving, Shiroko stopped Sensei. In a classroom, Shiroko showed Sensei the thing she found in Hoshino's bag: a resignation application, with the name Takanashi Hoshino. Sensei asked why Shiroko would do so, and Shiroko said it was because she thought that recently, Hoshino seemed to be behaving particularly strange, and there must be something hidden.

desc.zh_tw: 走之前，白子叫住了老師。在一間教室裡，白子向老師展示了從星野書包中找到的東西：退社信，對策委員會小鳥遊星野。老師問白子為什麼會這麼做，白子則表示是因為他覺得星野最近的行為非常怪異，之中一定有不可告人的東西。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 走之前，白子叫住了老师。在一间教室里，白子向老师展示了从星野书包中找到的东西：退社信，对策委员会小鸟游星野。老师问白子为什么会这么做，白子则表示是因为他觉得星野最近的行为非常怪异，之中一定有不可告人的东西。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.zh_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚藍檔案中的反派角色，隸屬於組織“數祕會”。其主要目標是研究基沃託斯中的神祕，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多個故事中均有出現。

desc.en: The PMC director proposed to add the losses caused by everyone to the amount owed. Hoshino recognized him, and the latter said hello to Hoshino. Then he "accidentally" leaked his hiring of the Problem Solver 68 and the Helmet Group. Afterwards, he said he wanted to have a good talk with Abydos about the debt.

desc.zh_tw: PMC理事提出要將眾人造成的損失一併加入欠款金額中。星野認出了他，後者像星野問好，並“無意間”說出了自己僱傭便利屋和頭盔團的事情。之後，他表示想和阿拜多斯好好談論一下債務。

desc.en: The Kaiser board member reveals their ambitions to find a massive treasure buried somewhere in Abydos. Then, using the Foreclosure Task Force's debt as leverage, the creditor forces them to back down. Hoshino calls for a retreat to the chagrin of the other task force members.
desc.jp: The Kaiser board member reveals their ambitions to find a massive treasure buried somewhere in Abydos. Then, using the Foreclosure Task Force's debt as leverage, the creditor forces them to back down. Hoshino calls for a retreat to the chagrin of the other task force members.

desc.zh_tw: 凱薩的幹部表明自己在找尋埋在阿拜多斯某處的寶物的野心，而且還利用債券壓迫對策委員會。星野帶著氣憤的對策委員會一行人暫時撤退。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 凯萨的干部表明自己在找寻埋在阿拜多斯某处的宝物的野心，而且还利用债券压迫对策委员会。星野带着气愤的对策委员会一行人暂时撤退。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 凯萨的干部表明自己在找寻埋在阿拜多斯某处的宝物的野心，而且还利用债券压迫对策委员会。星野带着气愤的对策委员会一行人暂时撤退。

desc.en: Ako talked big and claimed that she could write 1000 pages, but didn't expect Hina would actually be doing so. During the break, Ako asked Hina whether she knew about Hoshino or not. Hina said it was the first time for her to meet her, and disclosed that she was listed as a potential threat by Gehenna's Intelligence Agency for her ability; but she also agreed with Ako that Hoshino did seem to be completely different in these two years. Hina also mentioned about the battle at then, believing that if Ako continued combating, they could sustain a great loss because of Schale's assistance. She criticized Ako for being too impulsive.

Hina also mentioned about the battle at then, believing that if Ako continued combating, they could sustain a great loss because of Schale's assistance. She criticized Ako for being too impulsive.

Hina also mentioned about the battle at then, believing that if Ako continued combating, they could sustain a great loss because of Schale's assistance. She criticized Ako for being too impulsive.
desc.zh_tw: 亞子說大話，稱自己能寫1000頁，結果陽奈真的按她說的做了。間隙，亞子詢問陽奈是否對星野知情。陽奈表示自己也是第一次見她，並說她曾經因能力被格黑娜情報機構列為潛在威脅物件；但又同意亞子的看法，星野這兩年來的確判若兩人。陽奈之後又提到了當時的戰鬥，認為如果繼續戰鬥，在夏萊等的支援下，很可能會損失慘重，批評亞子過於衝動。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚子说大话，称自己能写1000页，结果日奈真的按她说的做了。间隙，亚子询问日奈是否对星野知情。日奈表示自己也是第一次见她，并说她曾经因能力被格黑娜情报机构列为潜在威胁对象；但又同意亚子的看法，星野这两年来的确判若两人。日奈之后又提到了当时的战斗，认为如果继续战斗，在夏莱等的支援下，很可能会损失惨重，批评亚子过于冲动。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚子说大话，称自己能写1000页，结果阳奈真的按她说的做了。间隙，亚子询问阳奈是否对星野知情。阳奈表示自己也是第一次见她，并说她曾经因能力被格黑娜情报机构列为潜在威胁对象；但又同意亚子的看法，星野这两年来的确判若两人。阳奈之后又提到了当时的战斗，认为如果继续战斗，在夏莱等的支援下，很可能会损失惨重，批评亚子过于冲动。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚子说大话，称自己能写1000页，结果阳奈真的按她说的做了。间隙，亚子询问阳奈是否对星野知情。阳奈表示自己也是第一次见她，并说她曾经因能力被格黑娜情报机构列为潜在威胁对象；但又同意亚子的看法，星野这两年来的确判若两人。阳奈之后又提到了当时的战斗，认为如果继续战斗，在夏莱等的支援下，很可能会损失惨重，批评亚子过于冲动。

desc.zh_tw: 儘管如此，陽奈還是想不明白，為什麼星野在經歷了“那件事”後，仍未離開阿拜多斯。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尽管如此，日奈还是想不明白，为什么星野在经历了“那件事”后，仍未离开阿拜多斯。

desc.en: Kaiser Director introduced himself to everyone, which was immediately got under fire. But the director didn't care, and said that given the current situation, it was true that the Foreclosure Task Force had invaded their own private lands. He aslo said that the troops were all for looking for treasures beneath Abydos, not for invading Abydos High School. None was convinced, and director demonstrated just how easy it would be for him to "actually sabotage Abydos".

He aslo said that the troops were all for looking for treasures beneath Abydos, not for invading Abydos High School. None was convinced, and director demonstrated just how easy it would be for him to "actually sabotage Abydos".

desc.zh_tw: 凱撒理事向各位介紹了自己的身份。眾人對PMC理事開始口誅筆伐，但後者並不在乎。就事論事，對策委員會一行人目前是侵犯了他們的私有土地，並大方地指出自己是為了尋找阿拜多斯地底下的某個寶貝，而這些兵力也絕非為了入侵阿拜多斯。眾人很不相信，理事於是便現場演示了“如何真正處置阿拜多斯”。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 凯撒理事向各位介绍了自己的身份。众人对PMC理事开始口诛笔伐，但后者并不在乎。就事论事，对策委员会一行人目前是侵犯了他们的私有土地，并大方地指出自己是为了寻找阿拜多斯地底下的某个宝贝，而这些兵力也绝非为了入侵阿拜多斯。众人很不相信，理事于是便现场演示了“如何真正处置阿拜多斯”。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 凯撒理事向各位介绍了自己的身份。众人对PMC理事开始口诛笔伐，但后者并不在乎。就事论事，对策委员会一行人目前是侵犯了他们的私有土地，并大方地指出自己是为了寻找阿拜多斯地底下的某个宝贝，而这些兵力也绝非为了入侵阿拜多斯。众人很不相信，理事于是便现场演示了“如何真正处置阿拜多斯”。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 凯撒理事向各位介绍了自己的身份。众人对PMC理事开始口诛笔伐，但后者并不在乎。就事论事，对策委员会一行人目前是侵犯了他们的私有土地，并大方地指出自己是为了寻找阿拜多斯地底下的某个宝贝，而这些兵力也绝非为了入侵阿拜多斯。众人很不相信，理事于是便现场演示了“如何真正处置阿拜多斯”。

desc.en: Kaiser Director made a call and said that Abydos High School's credit was at all-time low, and the interest rate would be raised 30 times higher. At the club room, Ayane answered the call and was greatly shocked. Kaiser Director also said that they would first need to pay a deposit in advance to prove their repayment ability. But that could never be achieved - and so, the director advised them to give up or drop out the school, or simply transfer to another one. No one was willing to step a step back. Hoshino said that it was useless to argue here and suggested to leave first.

desc.zh_tw: 凱撒理事打了個電話，表示阿拜多斯學校的信用已降到最低，並上調了30倍利率。在社團室的綾音收到了來電，大受震撼。凱撒理事表示，為了證明還款能力，他們必須先提前交納一筆保證金，但那根本不可能做到——理事此時便提出讓他們放棄學校，進行退學或轉學。眾人拒不後退。星野表示在這裡爭論沒有用，提議先行離開。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 凯撒理事打了个电话，表示阿拜多斯学校的信用已降到最低，并上调了30倍利率。在社团室的绫音收到了来电，大受震撼。凯撒理事表示，为了证明还款能力，他们必须先提前交纳一笔保证金，但那根本不可能做到——理事此时便提出让他们放弃学校，进行退学或转学。众人拒不后退。星野表示在这里争论没有用，提议先行离开。

desc.en: After sending her enraged underclassmen home, Hoshino reveals to Sensei the secret deal she was offered by the man in the black suit. Sensei tries to console her, but the next day finds no trace of Hoshino, save for her resignation letter.
desc.jp: After sending her enraged underclassmen home, Hoshino reveals to Sensei the secret deal she was offered by the man in the black suit. Sensei tries to console her, but the next day finds no trace of Hoshino, save for her resignation letter.

desc.zh_tw: 把氣憤的學妹們送回家後，星野把身穿黑西裝的男人曾向自己提出祕密交易的事告訴老師。雖然老師替星野打氣加油，但隔天星野卻留下自動退學書消失蹤影。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 把气愤的学妹们送回家后，星野把身穿黑西装的男人曾向自己提出秘密交易的事告诉老师。虽然老师替星野打气加油，但隔天星野却留下自动退学书消失踪影。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 把气愤的学妹们送回家后，星野把身穿黑西装的男人曾向自己提出秘密交易的事告诉老师。虽然老师替星野打气加油，但隔天星野却留下自动退学书消失踪影。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 把气愤的学妹们送回家后，星野把身穿黑西装的男人曾向自己提出秘密交易的事告诉老师。虽然老师替星野打气加油，但隔天星野却留下自动退学书消失踪影。

desc.en: Hoshino remembered the days with that former Student Union president. That president held a positive view of the future and believed that the future of Abydos would not be just like that. She also gifted a poster of the old festival to Hoshino. But Hoshino cut her down and denied her, ripping apart the poster at hand.
desc.jp: Hoshino remembered the days with that former Student Union president. That president held a positive view of the future and believed that the future of Abydos would not be just like that. She also gifted a poster of the old festival to Hoshino. But Hoshino cut her down and denied her, ripping apart the poster at hand.
desc.thai: Hoshino remembered the days with that former Student Union president. That president held a positive view of the future and believed that the future of Abydos would not be just like that. She also gifted a poster of the old festival to Hoshino. But Hoshino cut her down and denied her, ripping apart the poster at hand.
desc.ko: Hoshino remembered the days with that former Student Union president. That president held a positive view of the future and believed that the future of Abydos would not be just like that. She also gifted a poster of the old festival to Hoshino. But Hoshino cut her down and denied her, ripping apart the poster at hand.
desc.zh_tw: 星野記起了和以前那位學生會會長的事情。那位會長對未來的一切充滿希望，認定阿拜多斯的未來並非如此，還將以前慶典的一張海報給了星野。但星野打斷並否定了她，還撕爛了手中的海報。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野记起了和以前那位学生会会长的事情。那位会长对未来的一切充满希望，认定阿拜多斯的未来并非如此，还将以前庆典的一张海报给了星野。但星野打断并否定了她，还撕烂了手中的海报。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 星野记起了和以前那位学生会会长的事情。那位会长对未来的一切充满希望，认定阿拜多斯的未来并非如此，还将以前庆典的一张海报给了星野。但星野打断并否定了她，还撕烂了手中的海报。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 星野记起了和以前那位学生会会长的事情。那位会长对未来的一切充满希望，认定阿拜多斯的未来并非如此，还将以前庆典的一张海报给了星野。但星野打断并否定了她，还撕烂了手中的海报。

desc.en: Yume is the president of the former Abydos Student Council. She had worked together with Hoshino and holds a positive view of the future (as Hoshino recalls). Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.

Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.

desc.zh_tw: 夢是阿拜多斯前學生會的主席。她曾與星野一起工作，對未來抱有正面的想法（如星野所述）。她本人只在一張與星野一起拍的合照上出現過。當前沒有更多關於她的訊息，但有些人認為她可能已經死了，如在第一篇和最終篇中所呈現的一樣。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 梦是阿拜多斯前学生会的主席。她曾与星野一起工作，对未来抱有正面的想法（如星野所述）。她本人只在一张与星野一起拍的合照上出现过。当前没有更多关于她的消息，但有些人认为她可能已经死了，如在第一篇和最终篇中所呈现的一样。

desc.en: Everyone still couldn't understand what PMC was looking for; after all, high value stuff like oils had long been proved to be non-existed. Shiroko said she wanted to investigate it first, but got Ayane caught to be having the previous idea. Hoshino advised everyone to calm down and returned to take rests first.

desc.zh_tw: 眾人還是不理解PMC究竟在找什麼，畢竟石油之類的高價值物品已被探明並不存在。白子想先去調查一下，但被綾音識出可能實為去搶銀行，遭到阻止。星野讓大家冷靜下來，先行回去休息。

desc.en: Shiroko and Sensei waited into the nights. Hoshino sent Shiroko away for "being too tired". Sensei remained in the classroom and took out Hoshino's resignation application. Hoshino tried to move the problem onto Shiroko, but Sensei didn't let go. Hoshino agreed to talk about the situation, but first she would like to be out at the corridors.

desc.zh_tw: 白子和老師等到很晚才離開。星野因疲勞打發走了白子，但老師並未離開。老師拿出了星野的退社信，星野想把問題轉移到白子上，但老師緊追不放。星野同意向老師講述情況，但得出去到走廊上。

desc.en: The sandstorm brought much dust into the school corridors. Hoshino coughed a few times and apologized for the lack of manpower. Hoshino then muttered a few words. Sensei said that Hoshino seemed to be really liking Abydos, but got denied by the latter. Then, Hoshino told Sensei about the "deal".

desc.zh_tw: 因為風沙太大，積塵嚴重，星野咳了幾聲，表示學校人手實在不夠。星野之後又嘀咕了幾句。老師說星野看上去非常喜歡阿拜多斯，後者則表示了否定。之後，星野向老師講出了那個“請求”。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为风沙太大，积尘严重，星野咳了几声，表示学校人手实在不够。星野之后又嘀咕了几句。老师说星野看上去非常喜欢阿拜多斯，后者则表示了否定。之后，星野向老师讲出了那个“请求”。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.zh_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚藍檔案中的反派角色，隸屬於組織“數祕會”。其主要目標是研究基沃託斯中的神祕，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多個故事中均有出現。

desc.en: Hoshino suspected that PMC (especially the Black Suit) seemed to be hiring some professionals. Hoshino said that she had never seen people like him in Kivotos, and it appeared to her that even Kaiser Director feared him as well. As for the resignation application, Hoshino said it was nothing serious and ripped it apart in front of Sensei. Hoshino said she would made it clear for everyone, but also felt that it was the only option to accept that deal. Before leaving, Sensei made a promise to Hoshino that he would eventually come up with solutions.

desc.zh_tw: 星野推測PMC（尤其是黑服）似乎是在招募一些能手。星野表示她從沒在基沃託斯見過他那樣的人，而且似乎凱撒集團的理事也很怕他。至於退社信，星野表示只是腦袋一時糊塗，在老師面前撕掉了它。星野還表示明天會和大家說清楚，但又覺得接受那個請求似乎唯一無二。星野走前，老師承諾會想出解決方案。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野推测PMC（尤其是黑服）似乎是在招募一些能手。星野表示她从没在基沃托斯见过他那样的人，而且似乎凯撒集团的理事也很怕他。至于退社信，星野表示只是脑袋一时糊涂，在老师面前撕掉了它。星野还表示明天会和大家说清楚，但又觉得接受那个请求似乎唯一无二。星野走前，老师承诺会想出解决方案。

desc.en: In her letter, Hoshino reveals that she joined Kaiser PMC in exchange for Abydos High School's debt being forgiven. Now, without Hoshino, the remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force scramble when PMC forces close in on Abydos High School.
desc.jp: In her letter, Hoshino reveals that she joined Kaiser PMC in exchange for Abydos High School's debt being forgiven. Now, without Hoshino, the remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force scramble when PMC forces close in on Abydos High School.

desc.zh_tw: 星野在信上寫說，為了免除阿拜多斯高中的債務，自己已經去當凱薩PMC的傭兵。在其餘對策委員會一行人深感混亂之際，PMC兵力為了佔領星野消失蹤影的阿拜多斯高中而來犯。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野在信上写说，为了免除阿拜多斯高中的债务，自己已经去当凯萨PMC的佣兵。在其余对策委员会一行人深感混乱之际，PMC兵力为了占领星野消失踪影的阿拜多斯高中而来犯。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 星野在信上写说，为了免除阿拜多斯高中的债务，自己已经去当凯萨PMC的佣兵。在其余对策委员会一行人深感混乱之际，PMC兵力为了占领星野消失踪影的阿拜多斯高中而来犯。

desc.en: Hoshino left an resignation application and a letter. In the letter, Hoshino confessed the fact that she was going to be a mercenary at PMC, and said that "(the Black Suit) would take on half of Abydos' debt".

desc.zh_cn_jp: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: In yet another letter, Hoshino confessed that she did, neither like, nor believe adults. When Shiroko carried Sensei and arrived there, she was even disgusted; but eventually she trusted Sensei. She entrusted Shiroko to Sensei, hoping that Sensei could teach her well and don't let her make mistakes.

She entrusted Shiroko to Sensei, hoping that Sensei could teach her well and don't let her make mistakes.

desc.zh_tw: 星野在另一封信中坦白，自己並不喜歡大人，也不相信大人。在白子第一次將老師背來時，她甚至有點嫌棄，但最終她信任了老師。她還將白子託付給了老師，希望老師能教導管好白子，不要讓她犯錯。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野在另一封信中坦白，自己并不喜欢大人，也不相信大人。在白子第一次将老师背来时，她甚至有点嫌弃，但最终她信任了老师。她还将白子托付给了老师，希望老师能教导管好白子，不要让她犯错。

desc.en: Hoshino hoped that everyone could protect Abydos well. She added that, if ever, ever that they would meet her on the battlegrounds, she wanted them to destroy her halo.

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.

desc.en: PME led troops to disperse the citizens in Abydos, claiming that an order to leave immediately had been issued. As Hoshino, the former president of the former student union dropped out (i.e. being sold), the student union would not exist anymore, and as a result, the school would not, too.

desc.en: After joining up with Kaiser PMC, Hoshino defects when she learns that Abydos High School is under attack, but is then arrested by Black Suit. When all hope seems lost, Problem Solver 68 returns to Abydos to lend their aid to the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.jp: After joining up with Kaiser PMC, Hoshino defects when she learns that Abydos High School is under attack, but is then arrested by Black Suit. When all hope seems lost, Problem Solver 68 returns to Abydos to lend their aid to the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.thai: After joining up with Kaiser PMC, Hoshino defects when she learns that Abydos High School is under attack, but is then arrested by Black Suit. When all hope seems lost, Problem Solver 68 returns to Abydos to lend their aid to the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.ko: After joining up with Kaiser PMC, Hoshino defects when she learns that Abydos High School is under attack, but is then arrested by Black Suit. When all hope seems lost, Problem Solver 68 returns to Abydos to lend their aid to the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.zh_tw: 抵達凱薩PMC的星野，聽到阿拜多斯高中正遭受攻擊的訊息後表示抗議，但卻反而被黑色西裝人拘禁。在千鈞一髮之際，先前離開的便利屋68一行人出現在阿拜多斯，幫了對策委員會一把。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 抵达凯萨PMC的星野，听到阿拜多斯高中正遭受攻击的消息后表示抗议，但却反而被黑色西装人拘禁。在千钧一发之际，先前离开的便利屋68一行人出现在阿拜多斯，帮了对策委员会一把。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 抵达凯萨PMC的星野，听到阿拜多斯高中正遭受攻击的消息后表示抗议，但却反而被黑色西装人拘禁。在千钧一发之际，先前离开的便利屋68一行人出现在阿拜多斯，帮了对策委员会一把。

desc.en: Kaiser Director arrived and everyone was immediately triggered. Though claiming that they would be reported to the General Student Council, the director said it was useless and the time just proved that no one could be helping them. The director even pointed out that, due to Hoshino's dropout, Abydos High School was no longer existed. Everyone was shocked, but still argued with the existence of "The Foreclosure Task Force" - however, accroding to Ayane, as it was established after the dissolution of the Student Union, the Task Force was in fact a club that hadn't recognized officially. As a result, neither could it represent the school, nor could it be proved to be existed.

desc.zh_tw: 凱撒理事聞聲走來，眾人對凱撒PMC的無理侵犯表示憤怒，但理事並沒有被嚇倒。雖然揚言要報告聯邦學生會，但理事表示聯邦學生會並沒有用，而且這麼長時間以來的事情也證明了沒人來幫助他們。理事直接指出，由於學生會成員星野退學，阿拜多斯已不復存在，眾人大驚。眾人以“對策委員會”尚存抗爭，但綾音表示，由於學生會當時已不存在，所以它並非官方認證的社團，因而實際上無法代表學校，也無法被證明存在。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 凯撒理事闻声走来，众人对凯撒PMC的无理侵犯表示愤怒，但理事并没有被吓倒。虽然扬言要报告联邦学生会，但理事表示联邦学生会并没有用，而且这么长时间以来的事情也证明了没人来帮助他们。理事直接指出，由于学生会成员星野退学，阿拜多斯已不复存在，众人大惊。众人以“对策委员会”尚存抗争，但绫音表示，由于学生会当时已不存在，所以它并非官方认证的社团，因而实际上无法代表学校，也无法被证明存在。

desc.en: Hoshino was in great shock upon hearing PMC were attacking Abydos. The Black Suit explained that, after her dropout, Abydos would no longer have a student belonging to the Student Union (i.e. no Student Union), and therefore the school would not exist. The Black suit expressed his interest on establishing a new school purposed by PMC, but then clarified that their goal was actually Hoshino herself. The fact of cooperating with Kaiser was simply because the interests weren't in conflict. The Black Suit said, as the highest "Mythic" in Kivotos, he would be carrying out experiments on her.

desc.zh_tw: 星野聽到PMC攻擊阿拜多斯時震驚無比。黑服向星野解釋，因為她自己退學，阿拜多斯就沒有了學生會成員（即沒有了學生會），由此學校已經不復存在。黑服表示了對PMC建立一所新學校的興趣，但隨後表示他們的目標實際上是星野自己，而與凱撒聯手僅僅是因為利益不衝突罷了。黑服表示，作為基沃託斯最高的“神祕”，他將會對她進行實驗。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野听到PMC攻击阿拜多斯时震惊无比。黑服向星野解释，因为她自己退学，阿拜多斯就没有了学生会成员（即没有了学生会），由此学校已经不复存在。黑服表示了对PMC建立一所新学校的兴趣，但随后表示他们的目标实际上是星野自己，而与凯撒联手仅仅是因为利益不冲突罢了。黑服表示，作为基沃托斯最高的“神秘”，他将会对她进行实验。

desc.en: Problem Solver 68 arrived upon hearing the explosions, acknowledging that the PMC was really out of line. Aru slammed the Task Force for "giving up when your friends were in crisis", and repeated the motto that once the Masked Swimsuit Gang told her. In return for the help Abydos had made, Problem Solver 68 joined in the battle.

desc.zh_tw: 便利屋68聞訊趕到，認為PMC做的事情實在過於出格。亞瑠抨擊對策委員會“在朋友遇到危機時居然就此放棄”，並複述了泳裝蒙面團那時的座右銘。作為阿拜多斯一行人曾經幫助過他們的回報，便利屋68參與作戰。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 便利屋68闻讯赶到，认为PMC做的事情实在过于出格。阿露抨击对策委员会“在朋友遇到危机时居然就此放弃”，并复述了泳装蒙面团那时的座右铭。作为阿拜多斯一行人曾经帮助过他们的回报，便利屋68参与作战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 便利屋68闻讯赶到，认为PMC做的事情实在过于出格。亚瑠抨击对策委员会“在朋友遇到危机时居然就此放弃”，并复述了泳装蒙面团那时的座右铭。作为阿拜多斯一行人曾经帮助过他们的回报，便利屋68参与作战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 便利屋68闻讯赶到，认为PMC做的事情实在过于出格。亚瑠抨击对策委员会“在朋友遇到危机时居然就此放弃”，并复述了泳装蒙面团那时的座右铭。作为阿拜多斯一行人曾经帮助过他们的回报，便利屋68参与作战。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.

desc.zh_tw: 是PMC公司及其各個子公司的CEO，蔚藍檔案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇與最終章中均有出現，主要目標是將基沃託斯納入自己的手下統治；曾與黑色西服人合作過。

desc.en: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.jp: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.thai: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.ko: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人，在廢棄工廠遇到長得像人類的機器人少女，愛麗絲。桃井為了阻止遊戲開發部被廢社，於是便把愛麗絲帶到社團活動室，打算讓她成為社團成員。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃井为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃井为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃井为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。

desc.en: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.jp: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.thai: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.ko: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.zh_tw: 三人跑進了工廠裡，發現機器人不再跟隨。就在這時，設施裡的系統開始識別三人身份，並認出了老師，給三人發放了通行權限。三人從地板打開的門掉了下去。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 三人跑进了工厂里，发现机器人不再跟随。就在这时，设施里的系统开始识别三人身份，并认出了老师，给三人发放了通行权限。三人从地板打开的门掉了下去。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 三人跑进了工厂里，发现机器人不再跟随。就在这时，设施里的系统开始识别三人身份，并认出了老师，给三人发放了通行权限。三人从地板打开的门掉了下去。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 三人跑进了工厂里，发现机器人不再跟随。就在这时，设施里的系统开始识别三人身份，并认出了老师，给三人发放了通行权限。三人从地板打开的门掉了下去。

desc.en: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.
desc.jp: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.

desc.zh_tw: 三人在廢墟的一個天坑里發現了睡著著的愛麗絲，發現了“AL-1S”之類的字樣。綠可憐愛麗絲，便決定將她帶回千年，還給她穿上了自己的衣服。就在這時，愛麗絲因與老師接觸而醒了過來。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的爱丽丝，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。绿可怜爱丽丝，便决定将她带回千年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，爱丽丝因与老师接触而醒了过来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的爱丽丝，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。绿可怜爱丽丝，便决定将她带回千年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，爱丽丝因与老师接触而醒了过来。

desc.en: Momoi took Aris back to the club room and Midori was shocked. Knowing barely anything, Aris started tossing the stuffs in the club room, like putting controllers and game consoles into month. Momoi then talked about her plan: she wanted to let Aris pretend to be a student at here, solving the club member number problem.

desc.zh_tw: 桃井將愛麗絲帶回到社團活動室，綠非常驚詫。愛麗絲因為不懂，開始亂動社團的東西，比如把手柄和遊戲機塞進嘴里之類。桃井隨後說出了自己的計劃：她想讓愛麗絲偽裝成千年的學生加入社團，解決人數不夠被廢社的問題。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃井将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。

desc.en: Aris plays and thoroughly enjoys the Game Development Department's previous title, Tales Saga Chronicle. The club members are touched by her glowing response.
desc.jp: Aris plays and thoroughly enjoys the Game Development Department's previous title, Tales Saga Chronicle. The club members are touched by her glowing response.
desc.thai: Aris plays and thoroughly enjoys the Game Development Department's previous title, Tales Saga Chronicle. The club members are touched by her glowing response.
desc.ko: Aris plays and thoroughly enjoys the Game Development Department's previous title, Tales Saga Chronicle. The club members are touched by her glowing response.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲開心地玩著遊戲開發部的前作<傳說年代記>。遊戲開發部全員看她玩得這麼開心都大受感動。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝开心地玩着游戏开发部的前作<传说年代记>。游戏开发部全员看她玩得这么开心都大受感动。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝开心地玩着游戏开发部的前作<传说年代记>。游戏开发部全员看她玩得这么开心都大受感动。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝开心地玩着游戏开发部的前作<传说年代记>。游戏开发部全员看她玩得这么开心都大受感动。

desc.en: Momoi and Midori discussed the possibility of disguising Aris as a Millennium student. Momoi was in charge of getting a falsified student ID card, while Midori and Yuzu would teach Aris how to "speak", in the hope of correcting her fixed speech pattern.
desc.jp: Momoi and Midori discussed the possibility of disguising Aris as a Millennium student. Momoi was in charge of getting a falsified student ID card, while Midori and Yuzu would teach Aris how to "speak", in the hope of correcting her fixed speech pattern.
desc.thai: Momoi and Midori discussed the possibility of disguising Aris as a Millennium student. Momoi was in charge of getting a falsified student ID card, while Midori and Yuzu would teach Aris how to "speak", in the hope of correcting her fixed speech pattern.
desc.ko: Momoi and Midori discussed the possibility of disguising Aris as a Millennium student. Momoi was in charge of getting a falsified student ID card, while Midori and Yuzu would teach Aris how to "speak", in the hope of correcting her fixed speech pattern.
desc.zh_tw: 桃井和綠討論將愛麗絲偽裝成千年學生計劃的可行性。桃井負責去拿到假學生證，而綠和柚子負責教愛麗絲“說話”，希望將其高度機械化的語音模式修改過來。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井和绿讨论将爱丽丝伪装成千年学生计划的可行性。桃井负责去拿到假学生证，而绿和柚子负责教爱丽丝“说话”，希望将其高度机械化的语音模式修改过来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井和绿讨论将爱丽丝伪装成千年学生计划的可行性。桃井负责去拿到假学生证，而绿和柚子负责教爱丽丝“说话”，希望将其高度机械化的语音模式修改过来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃井和绿讨论将爱丽丝伪装成千年学生计划的可行性。桃井负责去拿到假学生证，而绿和柚子负责教爱丽丝“说话”，希望将其高度机械化的语音模式修改过来。

desc.en: Momoi left in advance and Midori was troubled with how to teach. At this moment Aris found a magazine about the game they made before. Midori then decided to let Aris try their games, attempting to teach her with in-game dialogues.
desc.jp: Momoi left in advance and Midori was troubled with how to teach. At this moment Aris found a magazine about the game they made before. Midori then decided to let Aris try their games, attempting to teach her with in-game dialogues.

desc.zh_tw: 桃井先行離開，綠為如何教愛麗絲說話而苦惱著。這時，愛麗絲則發現了一本曾經寫著他們做的遊戲的雜誌。綠於是決定讓愛麗絲玩玩自己的遊戲，試著用遊戲中的對話教會愛麗絲。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井先行离开，绿为如何教爱丽丝说话而苦恼着。这时，爱丽丝则发现了一本曾经写着他们做的游戏的杂志。绿于是决定让爱丽丝玩玩自己的游戏，试着用游戏中的对话教会爱丽丝。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井先行离开，绿为如何教爱丽丝说话而苦恼着。这时，爱丽丝则发现了一本曾经写着他们做的游戏的杂志。绿于是决定让爱丽丝玩玩自己的游戏，试着用游戏中的对话教会爱丽丝。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃井先行离开，绿为如何教爱丽丝说话而苦恼着。这时，爱丽丝则发现了一本曾经写着他们做的游戏的杂志。绿于是决定让爱丽丝玩玩自己的游戏，试着用游戏中的对话教会爱丽丝。

desc.en: Aris started the game while Momoi and Midori explained about the game. Though faced with countless failures and crashed her system for several times, she kept going on and eventually made it.

desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲一邊開始遊戲，一邊聽桃井和綠的講解。儘管愛麗絲多次失敗且遇到了系統卡死問題，但她仍奮起直追，最終通關。

desc.en: With the help of Momoi and Midori, Aris was able to reach the True End within 3 hours. When asked about the comments on the game, Aris thought it was fun. Hearing this, Yuzu stepped out of the wardrobe, thanking Aris sincerely.
desc.jp: With the help of Momoi and Midori, Aris was able to reach the True End within 3 hours. When asked about the comments on the game, Aris thought it was fun. Hearing this, Yuzu stepped out of the wardrobe, thanking Aris sincerely.
desc.thai: With the help of Momoi and Midori, Aris was able to reach the True End within 3 hours. When asked about the comments on the game, Aris thought it was fun. Hearing this, Yuzu stepped out of the wardrobe, thanking Aris sincerely.
desc.ko: With the help of Momoi and Midori, Aris was able to reach the True End within 3 hours. When asked about the comments on the game, Aris thought it was fun. Hearing this, Yuzu stepped out of the wardrobe, thanking Aris sincerely.
desc.zh_tw: 在桃井和綠兩人的幫助下，愛麗絲在三小時內通關了True End。兩人問及愛麗絲對遊戲的評價時，愛麗絲認為遊戲很有意思，聽到此言的柚子終於從櫃子裡出來了。柚子真誠地對愛麗絲道了謝。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在桃井和绿两人的帮助下，爱丽丝在三小时内通关了True End。两人问及爱丽丝对游戏的评价时，爱丽丝认为游戏很有意思，听到此言的柚子终于从柜子里出来了。柚子真诚地对爱丽丝道了谢。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在桃井和绿两人的帮助下，爱丽丝在三小时内通关了True End。两人问及爱丽丝对游戏的评价时，爱丽丝认为游戏很有意思，听到此言的柚子终于从柜子里出来了。柚子真诚地对爱丽丝道了谢。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在桃井和绿两人的帮助下，爱丽丝在三小时内通关了True End。两人问及爱丽丝对游戏的评价时，爱丽丝认为游戏很有意思，听到此言的柚子终于从柜子里出来了。柚子真诚地对爱丽丝道了谢。

desc.en: The Game Development Department makes it to a rundown factory. As if by instinct, Aris is drawn to the computer which contains G.BIBLE. She's able to download the data onto her gaming device...
desc.jp: The Game Development Department makes it to a rundown factory. As if by instinct, Aris is drawn to the computer which contains G.BIBLE. She's able to download the data onto her gaming device...
desc.thai: The Game Development Department makes it to a rundown factory. As if by instinct, Aris is drawn to the computer which contains G.BIBLE. She's able to download the data onto her gaming device...
desc.ko: The Game Development Department makes it to a rundown factory. As if by instinct, Aris is drawn to the computer which contains G.BIBLE. She's able to download the data onto her gaming device...
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人抵達目的地——位於廢墟的工廠。愛麗絲在那裡靠直覺找到儲存<G.Bible>的電腦，並且成功把資料下載到遊戲機裡。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人抵达目的地——位于废墟的工厂。爱丽丝在那里靠直觉找到储存<G.Bible>的电脑，并且成功把资料下载到游戏机里。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人抵达目的地——位于废墟的工厂。爱丽丝在那里靠直觉找到储存<G.Bible>的电脑，并且成功把资料下载到游戏机里。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人抵达目的地——位于废墟的工厂。爱丽丝在那里靠直觉找到储存<G.Bible>的电脑，并且成功把资料下载到游戏机里。

desc.en: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.jp: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.thai: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.ko: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.zh_tw: 眾人到達了工廠，但愛麗絲卻突然記起了什麼，自顧自的行動。眾人跟隨著愛麗絲，找到了一台搭載著“Divi: Sion”系統的電腦。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人到达了工厂，但爱丽丝却突然记起了什么，自顾自的行动。众人跟随着爱丽丝，找到了一台搭载着“Divi: Sion”系统的电脑。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人到达了工厂，但爱丽丝却突然记起了什么，自顾自的行动。众人跟随着爱丽丝，找到了一台搭载着“Divi: Sion”系统的电脑。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 众人到达了工厂，但爱丽丝却突然记起了什么，自顾自的行动。众人跟随着爱丽丝，找到了一台搭载着“Divi: Sion”系统的电脑。

desc.en: The computer recognized Aris but was about to shut down due to low battery, with data on board going to be lost as well. To get the G.Bible saved on it, Momoi gave away her game console and her game saves. At last the data was secured, but it required a password to access. Momoi complained and unintentionally attracted the robots.
desc.jp: The computer recognized Aris but was about to shut down due to low battery, with data on board going to be lost as well. To get the G.Bible saved on it, Momoi gave away her game console and her game saves. At last the data was secured, but it required a password to access. Momoi complained and unintentionally attracted the robots.

desc.zh_tw: 電腦認出了愛麗絲，但突然電量不足即將關機，數據被毀在即；為了得到其存儲的《G.Bible》，桃井獻出了自己的遊戲機與存檔。數據得以保存，但需密碼才可訪問；桃井大聲抱怨，結果引來了機器人。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 电脑认出了爱丽丝，但突然电量不足即将关机，数据被毁在即；为了得到其存储的《G.Bible》，桃井献出了自己的游戏机与存档。数据得以保存，但需密码才可访问；桃井大声抱怨，结果引来了机器人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 电脑认出了爱丽丝，但突然电量不足即将关机，数据被毁在即；为了得到其存储的《G.Bible》，桃井献出了自己的游戏机与存档。数据得以保存，但需密码才可访问；桃井大声抱怨，结果引来了机器人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 电脑认出了爱丽丝，但突然电量不足即将关机，数据被毁在即；为了得到其存储的《G.Bible》，桃井献出了自己的游戏机与存档。数据得以保存，但需密码才可访问；桃井大声抱怨，结果引来了机器人。

desc.en: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris comes to the rescue and succeeds in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.
desc.jp: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris comes to the rescue and succeeds in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.
desc.thai: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris comes to the rescue and succeeds in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.
desc.ko: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris comes to the rescue and succeeds in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.
desc.zh_tw: 因為耽誤到時間的關係，朱音和花凛也從封鎖中解放出來。就這樣，遊戲開發部又再次陷入危機。這時，愛麗絲及時現身解救遊戲開發部，讓一行人成功進入學生會扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为耽误到时间的关系，茜和花凛也从封锁中解放出来。就这样，游戏开发部又再次陷入危机。这时，爱丽丝及时现身解救游戏开发部，让一行人成功进入学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 因为耽误到时间的关系，朱音和花凛也从封锁中解放出来。就这样，游戏开发部又再次陷入危机。这时，爱丽丝及时现身解救游戏开发部，让一行人成功进入学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 因为耽误到时间的关系，朱音和花凛也从封锁中解放出来。就这样，游戏开发部又再次陷入危机。这时，爱丽丝及时现身解救游戏开发部，让一行人成功进入学生会扣押品保管所。

desc.en: Yuuka put the confiscated robots into the battle. Asuna was tough to deal with. The Engineering Department failed to suppress the sniper Karin. Akane was on her way. At the seemingly hopeless moment, the Game Development Department remembered the meeting.
desc.jp: Yuuka put the confiscated robots into the battle. Asuna was tough to deal with. The Engineering Department failed to suppress the sniper Karin. Akane was on her way. At the seemingly hopeless moment, the Game Development Department remembered the meeting.
desc.thai: Yuuka put the confiscated robots into the battle. Asuna was tough to deal with. The Engineering Department failed to suppress the sniper Karin. Akane was on her way. At the seemingly hopeless moment, the Game Development Department remembered the meeting.
desc.ko: Yuuka put the confiscated robots into the battle. Asuna was tough to deal with. The Engineering Department failed to suppress the sniper Karin. Akane was on her way. At the seemingly hopeless moment, the Game Development Department remembered the meeting.
desc.zh_tw: 優香命令將收繳來的機器人加入戰場，明日奈的戰力也絕非等閒之輩，工程部無力壓制狙擊手花凜，朱音也正在趕來。在似乎無望之際，眾人想起了之前會議的內容。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香命令将收缴来的机器人加入战场，明日奈的战力也绝非等闲之辈，工程部无力压制狙击手花凛，茜也正在赶来。在似乎无望之际，众人想起了之前会议的内容。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香命令将收缴来的机器人加入战场，明日奈的战力也绝非等闲之辈，工程部无力压制狙击手花凛，朱音也正在赶来。在似乎无望之际，众人想起了之前会议的内容。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香命令将收缴来的机器人加入战场，明日奈的战力也绝非等闲之辈，工程部无力压制狙击手花凛，朱音也正在赶来。在似乎无望之际，众人想起了之前会议的内容。

desc.en: Everyone agreed that the plan itself tolerates no failure, so a backup plan is required. After the power failure, Aris sensed that the time was ripe. She escaped the self-reflection room and headed to the Contraband Room.
desc.jp: Everyone agreed that the plan itself tolerates no failure, so a backup plan is required. After the power failure, Aris sensed that the time was ripe. She escaped the self-reflection room and headed to the Contraband Room.
desc.thai: Everyone agreed that the plan itself tolerates no failure, so a backup plan is required. After the power failure, Aris sensed that the time was ripe. She escaped the self-reflection room and headed to the Contraband Room.
desc.ko: Everyone agreed that the plan itself tolerates no failure, so a backup plan is required. After the power failure, Aris sensed that the time was ripe. She escaped the self-reflection room and headed to the Contraband Room.
desc.zh_tw: 眾人認為計劃的容錯率完全為零，因而需要準備後備計劃。停電後，愛麗絲檢測到時機成熟，逃出了反省室，前往保管所。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人认为计划的容错率完全为零，因而需要准备后备计划。停电后，爱丽丝检测到时机成熟，逃出了反省室，前往保管所。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人认为计划的容错率完全为零，因而需要准备后备计划。停电后，爱丽丝检测到时机成熟，逃出了反省室，前往保管所。

desc.en: Yuuka and others finally arrived and announced that the GDD would be confined or suspended. Aris appeared suddenly and got rid of the barriers; Karin was re-suppressed as well. Aris mentioned that, in every RPG games she had played, the hero will never abandon friends. Encouraged, everyone started to engage.
desc.jp: Yuuka and others finally arrived and announced that the GDD would be confined or suspended. Aris appeared suddenly and got rid of the barriers; Karin was re-suppressed as well. Aris mentioned that, in every RPG games she had played, the hero will never abandon friends. Encouraged, everyone started to engage.
desc.thai: Yuuka and others finally arrived and announced that the GDD would be confined or suspended. Aris appeared suddenly and got rid of the barriers; Karin was re-suppressed as well. Aris mentioned that, in every RPG games she had played, the hero will never abandon friends. Encouraged, everyone started to engage.
desc.ko: Yuuka and others finally arrived and announced that the GDD would be confined or suspended. Aris appeared suddenly and got rid of the barriers; Karin was re-suppressed as well. Aris mentioned that, in every RPG games she had played, the hero will never abandon friends. Encouraged, everyone started to engage.
desc.zh_tw: 優香等人終於到齊，宣佈了要把遊戲開發部關禁閉的處分。愛麗絲突然出現，以光之劍破除了障礙；花凜也被重新壓制。愛麗絲特別提到，在所有RPG遊戲中，勇者是從來不會放棄同伴的。受到鼓勵的眾人開始迎戰。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香等人终于到齐，宣布了要把游戏开发部关禁闭的处分。爱丽丝突然出现，以光之剑破除了障碍；花凛也被重新压制。爱丽丝特别提到，在所有RPG游戏中，勇者是从来不会放弃同伴的。受到鼓励的众人开始迎战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香等人终于到齐，宣布了要把游戏开发部关禁闭的处分。爱丽丝突然出现，以光之剑破除了障碍；花凛也被重新压制。爱丽丝特别提到，在所有RPG游戏中，勇者是从来不会放弃同伴的。受到鼓励的众人开始迎战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香等人终于到齐，宣布了要把游戏开发部关禁闭的处分。爱丽丝突然出现，以光之剑破除了障碍；花凛也被重新压制。爱丽丝特别提到，在所有RPG游戏中，勇者是从来不会放弃同伴的。受到鼓励的众人开始迎战。

desc.en: Akane apologizes to Neru for her failures, but Neru is more interested in how Aris managed to go toe-to-toe with the Maid Club. Back at the club room, the Game Development Department tries to use the Mirror to decrypt G.BIBLE.
desc.jp: Akane apologizes to Neru for her failures, but Neru is more interested in how Aris managed to go toe-to-toe with the Maid Club. Back at the club room, the Game Development Department tries to use the Mirror to decrypt G.BIBLE.
desc.thai: Akane apologizes to Neru for her failures, but Neru is more interested in how Aris managed to go toe-to-toe with the Maid Club. Back at the club room, the Game Development Department tries to use the Mirror to decrypt G.BIBLE.
desc.ko: Akane apologizes to Neru for her failures, but Neru is more interested in how Aris managed to go toe-to-toe with the Maid Club. Back at the club room, the Game Development Department tries to use the Mirror to decrypt G.BIBLE.
desc.zh_tw: 戰鬥後，朱音對任務失敗一事向寧瑠道歉，但寧瑠卻反而表示，對和女僕部打得不相上下的愛麗絲感興趣。另一方面，回到社團活動室的遊戲開發部一行人試著使用<鏡子>解讀<G.Bible>。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 战斗后，茜对任务失败一事向尼禄道歉，但尼禄却反而表示，对和女仆部打得不相上下的爱丽丝感兴趣。另一方面，回到社团活动室的游戏开发部一行人试着使用<镜子>解读<G.Bible>。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 战斗后，朱音对任务失败一事向宁瑠道歉，但宁瑠却反而表示，对和女仆部打得不相上下的爱丽丝感兴趣。另一方面，回到社团活动室的游戏开发部一行人试着使用<镜子>解读<G.Bible>。

desc.en: Akane apologized for accepting the request and making everyone feel ashamed. Neru said the request was cancelled, and she was interested in Aris in particular. She instructed Asuna to find all the information about the Game Development Department.

desc.zh_tw: 朱音為接下該項委託給大家蒙羞抱歉，尼祿則表示大可不必，並表示委託已被取消。尼祿對愛麗絲特別感興趣，讓明日奈等人去查清遊戲開發部全員的資料。

desc.en: After defeating the AMAS, Neru engages in a fearsome game of cat and mouse with Toki. Neru is eventually pinned down by Toki's ambush, and neither Midori or Yuzu are able to deal with the unexpected situation. Aris, who had been watching this all take place, makes an important decision.
desc.jp: After defeating the AMAS, Neru engages in a fearsome game of cat and mouse with Toki. Neru is eventually pinned down by Toki's ambush, and neither Midori or Yuzu are able to deal with the unexpected situation. Aris, who had been watching this all take place, makes an important decision.
desc.thai: After defeating the AMAS, Neru engages in a fearsome game of cat and mouse with Toki. Neru is eventually pinned down by Toki's ambush, and neither Midori or Yuzu are able to deal with the unexpected situation. Aris, who had been watching this all take place, makes an important decision.
desc.ko: After defeating the AMAS, Neru engages in a fearsome game of cat and mouse with Toki. Neru is eventually pinned down by Toki's ambush, and neither Midori or Yuzu are able to deal with the unexpected situation. Aris, who had been watching this all take place, makes an important decision.
desc.zh_tw: 擊倒AMAS，寧瑠和季展開了追逐戰。但最後寧瑠卻因為遭到季襲擊而倒下，綠和柚子也因為突如其來的狀況而措手不及。看見這一切情景後，愛麗絲做出重大的決定，並且向在場的所有人宣言。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 击倒AMAS，尼禄和时展开了追逐战。但最后尼禄却因为遭到时袭击而倒下，绿和柚子也因为突如其来的状况而措手不及。看见这一切情景后，爱丽丝做出重大的决定，并且向在场的所有人宣言。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 击倒AMAS，宁瑠和季展开了追逐战。但最后宁瑠却因为遭到季袭击而倒下，绿和柚子也因为突如其来的状况而措手不及。看见这一切情景后，爱丽丝做出重大的决定，并且向在场的所有人宣言。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 击倒AMAS，宁瑠和季展开了追逐战。但最后宁瑠却因为遭到季袭击而倒下，绿和柚子也因为突如其来的状况而措手不及。看见这一切情景后，爱丽丝做出重大的决定，并且向在场的所有人宣言。

desc.en: Neru said that the AMAS were nothing capable of, and Rio was forced to let Toki start repression. Toki, after switching the so-called "mode", became much more agile and knocked down Neru in no time.
desc.jp: Neru said that the AMAS were nothing capable of, and Rio was forced to let Toki start repression. Toki, after switching the so-called "mode", became much more agile and knocked down Neru in no time.
desc.thai: Neru said that the AMAS were nothing capable of, and Rio was forced to let Toki start repression. Toki, after switching the so-called "mode", became much more agile and knocked down Neru in no time.
desc.ko: Neru said that the AMAS were nothing capable of, and Rio was forced to let Toki start repression. Toki, after switching the so-called "mode", became much more agile and knocked down Neru in no time.
desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠表示AMAS不值一提，莉央無奈只能正式讓季開始壓制。切換了所謂“模式”的季動作達到了前所未有的敏捷，瞬間就將寧瑠打倒並壓制。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄表示AMAS不值一提，莉央无奈只能正式让时开始压制。切换了所谓“模式”的时动作达到了前所未有的敏捷，瞬间就将尼禄打倒并压制。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠表示AMAS不值一提，莉央无奈只能正式让季开始压制。切换了所谓“模式”的季动作达到了前所未有的敏捷，瞬间就将宁瑠打倒并压制。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 宁瑠表示AMAS不值一提，莉央无奈只能正式让季开始压制。切换了所谓“模式”的季动作达到了前所未有的敏捷，瞬间就将宁瑠打倒并压制。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: After suppressing Neru, Rio instructed AMAS to retrieve Aris. Yuzu and Midori attempted to stop but received harsh warnings from Rio. Sensei asked Rio to stop, but got questioned instead that, "Shouldn't the adults understand her better?" Sensei argued that he should "protect the students" but got questioned more seriously instead.
desc.jp: After suppressing Neru, Rio instructed AMAS to retrieve Aris. Yuzu and Midori attempted to stop but received harsh warnings from Rio. Sensei asked Rio to stop, but got questioned instead that, "Shouldn't the adults understand her better?" Sensei argued that he should "protect the students" but got questioned more seriously instead.

desc.ko: After suppressing Neru, Rio instructed AMAS to retrieve Aris. Yuzu and Midori attempted to stop but received harsh warnings from Rio. Sensei asked Rio to stop, but got questioned instead that, "Shouldn't the adults understand her better?" Sensei argued that he should "protect the students" but got questioned more seriously instead.
desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠被壓制後，莉央指示AMAS去回收愛麗絲。柚子和綠試圖阻止，但遭莉央嚴厲警告。老師讓莉央住手，莉央反問老師作為大人更應理解她才對，但老師以“保護學生”為由爭論，遭到莉央的強烈質問。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄被压制后，莉央指示AMAS去回收爱丽丝。柚子和绿试图阻止，但遭莉央严厉警告。老师让莉央住手，莉央反问老师作为大人更应理解她才对，但老师以“保护学生”为由争论，遭到莉央的强烈质问。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 宁瑠被压制后，莉央指示AMAS去回收爱丽丝。柚子和绿试图阻止，但遭莉央严厉警告。老师让莉央住手，莉央反问老师作为大人更应理解她才对，但老师以“保护学生”为由争论，遭到莉央的强烈质问。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 宁瑠被压制后，莉央指示AMAS去回收爱丽丝。柚子和绿试图阻止，但遭莉央严厉警告。老师让莉央住手，莉央反问老师作为大人更应理解她才对，但老师以“保护学生”为由争论，遭到莉央的强烈质问。

desc.en: Rio stressed that sacrificing one to save the others are nowhere near being a fault, and talked again about the identity of Aris. Midori tried to argue with the symbol of a hero, aka the Sword of Light created by the Engineering Department; but Rio shut it down remotely and made the excuse ineffective against that. Neru called for Aris to not give up but didn't work. Aris remembered everyone and was afraid to harm anyone anymore. At last she agreed to go with Rio. The others felt down but were powerless to do anything.

The others felt down but were powerless to do anything.
desc.zh_tw: 莉央強調犧牲一人為其他人的做法是正確的，並且再次申明瞭愛麗絲的身份。綠試圖以工程部的軌道炮為“勇者”的證明理論，但莉央遠端關閉了電源，這一證明被無效化。寧瑠在一旁督促愛麗絲不要放棄，但最終並未如願。愛麗絲會想起種種，擔心再給大家帶來傷害，最後同意與會長走，其他人雖然失落但也毫無他法。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央强调牺牲一人为其他人的做法是正确的，并且再次申明了爱丽丝的身份。绿试图以工程部的轨道炮为“勇者”的证明理论，但莉央远程关闭了电源，这一证明被无效化。尼禄在一旁督促爱丽丝不要放弃，但最终并未如愿。爱丽丝会想起种种，担心再给大家带来伤害，最后同意与会长走，其他人虽然失落但也毫无他法。

desc.en: The Game Development Department and others search for Aris' whereabouts. With the help of Noa and Yuuka, they learn that Aris is headed to Eridu, a fortified city that Rio built. Before infiltrating Eridu, Neru proposes a plan.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department and others search for Aris' whereabouts. With the help of Noa and Yuuka, they learn that Aris is headed to Eridu, a fortified city that Rio built. Before infiltrating Eridu, Neru proposes a plan.

desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部正在尋找愛麗絲的行蹤。藉由乃愛和優香的協助後，調查出愛麗絲已經前往莉央創造的要塞都市「埃裡都」了。在潛入埃裡都之前，寧瑠提出一項作戰方案。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部正在寻找爱丽丝的行踪。借由诺亚和优香的协助后，调查出爱丽丝已经前往莉央创造的要塞都市「埃里都」了。在潜入埃里都之前，尼禄提出一项作战方案。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部正在寻找爱丽丝的行踪。借由乃爱和优香的协助后，调查出爱丽丝已经前往莉央创造的要塞都市「埃里都」了。在潜入埃里都之前，宁瑠提出一项作战方案。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部正在寻找爱丽丝的行踪。借由乃爱和优香的协助后，调查出爱丽丝已经前往莉央创造的要塞都市「埃里都」了。在潜入埃里都之前，宁瑠提出一项作战方案。

desc.en: The people contacted Yuuka. Yuuka was surprised to hear that Aris had been taken away. Sensei asked help from Seminar and hoped to locate Aris.
desc.jp: The people contacted Yuuka. Yuuka was surprised to hear that Aris had been taken away. Sensei asked help from Seminar and hoped to locate Aris.
desc.thai: The people contacted Yuuka. Yuuka was surprised to hear that Aris had been taken away. Sensei asked help from Seminar and hoped to locate Aris.
desc.ko: The people contacted Yuuka. Yuuka was surprised to hear that Aris had been taken away. Sensei asked help from Seminar and hoped to locate Aris.
desc.zh_tw: 眾人聯絡了優香等人，優香聽聞愛麗絲被帶走一事大為驚訝。老師向研討會請求幫助，希望能確認愛麗絲的具體所在地。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人联系了优香等人，优香听闻爱丽丝被带走一事大为惊讶。老师向研讨会请求帮助，希望能确认爱丽丝的具体所在地。

desc.en: As Sensei expected, Yuuka and Noa found financial records that were intentionally hid and deleted. Yuuka was even surprised by this. After recovering and tracking, Yuuka found a fortress city named "Eridu", which was said to be built by the President. Yuuka sent the location and apologized for not being able to help due to the position they were standing.

desc.zh_tw: 不出老師所料，優香和乃愛找到了被刻意隱藏和刪除的財務記錄，就連優香都對此表示驚歎。在恢復並追蹤去向後，優香找到了一個叫做“Eridu”的要塞都市，據稱正是會長所建。優香將座標傳送給眾人，並表示自己所處的立場不好給予更多協助後匆匆離開。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 不出老师所料，优香和诺亚找到了被刻意隐藏和删除的财务记录，就连优香都对此表示惊叹。在恢复并追踪去向后，优香找到了一个叫做“Eridu”的要塞都市，据称正是会长所建。优香将坐标发送给众人，并表示自己所处的立场不好给予更多协助后匆匆离开。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 不出老师所料，优香和乃爱找到了被刻意隐藏和删除的财务记录，就连优香都对此表示惊叹。在恢复并追踪去向后，优香找到了一个叫做“Eridu”的要塞都市，据称正是会长所建。优香将坐标发送给众人，并表示自己所处的立场不好给予更多协助后匆匆离开。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 不出老师所料，优香和乃爱找到了被刻意隐藏和删除的财务记录，就连优香都对此表示惊叹。在恢复并追踪去向后，优香找到了一个叫做“Eridu”的要塞都市，据称正是会长所建。优香将坐标发送给众人，并表示自己所处的立场不好给予更多协助后匆匆离开。

desc.en: The Engineering Department believed that the construction materials of the city should be sent from the Millennium, so it is only necessary to find the unmanned transport vehicles heading to the city and replace them with goods. Sensei wondered why the Engineering Department would be willing to participate in this matter, and Utaha said that the "Sword of Light" that the president took away from Aris was already exceeding his authority. In a sense, it was a declaration of war on them.

Sensei wondered why the Engineering Department would be willing to participate in this matter, and Utaha said that the "Sword of Light" that the president took away from Aris was already exceeding his authority. In a sense, it was a declaration of war on them.
desc.thai: The Engineering Department believed that the construction materials of the city should be sent from the Millennium, so it is only necessary to find the unmanned transport vehicles heading to the city and replace them with goods. Sensei wondered why the Engineering Department would be willing to participate in this matter, and Utaha said that the "Sword of Light" that the president took away from Aris was already exceeding his authority. In a sense, it was a declaration of war on them.
desc.ko: The Engineering Department believed that the construction materials of the city should be sent from the Millennium, so it is only necessary to find the unmanned transport vehicles heading to the city and replace them with goods. Sensei wondered why the Engineering Department would be willing to participate in this matter, and Utaha said that the "Sword of Light" that the president took away from Aris was already exceeding his authority. In a sense, it was a declaration of war on them.
desc.zh_tw: 工程部認為都市的建造原料應該是從千年本地發出，因而只要找到前往都市的無人運送車，將他們置換成貨物裝進去即可。老師好奇工程部為何會願意參與此事，詠葉則表示會長帶走愛麗絲的“光之劍”本身已屬越權，某種意義上屬於對工程部宣戰。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 工程部认为都市的建造原料应该是从千年本地发出，因而只要找到前往都市的无人运送车，将他们置换成货物装进去即可。老师好奇工程部为何会愿意参与此事，歌原则表示会长带走爱丽丝的“光之剑”本身已属越权，某种意义上属于对工程部宣战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 工程部认为都市的建造原料应该是从千年本地发出，因而只要找到前往都市的无人运送车，将他们置换成货物装进去即可。老师好奇工程部为何会愿意参与此事，咏叶则表示会长带走爱丽丝的“光之剑”本身已属越权，某种意义上属于对工程部宣战。
